nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') FROM SyntheticCheck where entityGuid = AvailabilitySynthetics SINCE 7 day ago

select count(*) as 'Transactions' FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle'

FROM K8sReplicasetSample SELECT  latest(podsReady)  WHERE clusterName = cluster_name AND namespaceName in (namespace_names) and  (concat(capture(deploymentName, r'dep-(?P<name>[A-Za-z-]*)-.*'),'-sea-emm-prod') in (appNames) or concat(capture(deploymentName, r'dep-(?P<name>[A-Za-z-]*)-.*'),'-sea-emm-prd') in (appNames))  facet deploymentName limit max
SELECT average(dtuConsumptionPercent.Total) AS 'DTU Used %'  FROM AzureSqlDatabaseSample where name in (azureDBNames) facet name
select count(*) as 'Transactions with Error' FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and error = true

SELECT clamp_max(percentage(count(*), WHERE error IS false) / 100 * 100, 100) AS 'Success Rate Based Availability'
FROM Transaction 
WHERE  name like 'WebTransaction/SpringController%' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle'  and clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) COMPARE WITH  1 day ago

SELECT clamp_max(percentage(count(*), WHERE error IS true) / 100 * 100, 100) AS 'Error Percentage'
FROM Transaction 
WHERE  name like 'WebTransaction/SpringController%' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle'  and clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) since 1 hour ago COMPARE WITH  1 day ago

SELECT clamp_max(percentage(count(*), WHERE duration < 2 AND error IS FALSE) / 95 * 100, 100) AS 'SLO Attainment %'
FROM Transaction 
WHERE clusterName = cluster_name and appName in (appNames) and  name like 'WebTransaction/SpringController%' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' and namespaceName in (namespace_names)

SELECT count(*) as 'Transactions Breached SLO'
FROM Transaction 
WHERE clusterName = cluster_name and appName in (appNames) and  name like 'WebTransaction/SpringController%' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' and duration > 2
select count(*) FROM TransactionError where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames)  facet appName, error.class, error.message limit max

FROM Transaction
SELECT uniqueCount(podName) AS 'Pod Count'
WHERE namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and clusterName=cluster_name 
FACET appName
TIMESERIES
WITH TIMEZONE 'Asia/Singapore'

FROM Metric SELECT average(numeric(getField(azure.cache.redis.usedmemorypercentage, max))) AS 'Redis Storage Usage (%)'  where azure.resourceName in (azureRedisCacheNames) TIMESERIES auto facet azure.resourceName

select uniqueCount(deploymentName) as 'Services DOWN'  from K8sDeploymentSample where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and displayName not like '%rsf-cfgserver%' and  (concat(capture(deploymentName, r'dep-(?P<name>[A-Za-z-]*)-.*'),'-sea-emm-prod') in (appNames) or concat(capture(deploymentName, r'dep-(?P<name>[A-Za-z-]*)-.*'),'-sea-emm-prd') in (appNames)) and podsAvailable <= 0 limit max facet deploymentName TIMESERIES auto

widgets.title: Azure Service Bus - Deadletter Messages (Applicable for PROD)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(deadletteredMessages.Average) as 'DEAD LETTER MESSAGES BY TOPIC' from AzureServiceBusTopicSample where namespace in (azureServiceBusNames) and name in (azureServiceBusTopicNames) and deadletteredMessages.Average > 0 LIMIT max facet name
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and error is true facet appName TIMESERIES auto

FROM K8sContainerSample SELECT latest(requestedCpuCoresUtilization) as '% CPU' FACET `label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`  UNTIL 1 minute ago TIMESERIES limit 50 WHERE namespaceName in (namespace_names) and (concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prod') in (appNames) or concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prd') in (appNames)) and clusterName=cluster_name
SELECT latest(confluent_kafka_server_consumer_lag_offsets) FROM Metric where kafka_id in (confluentKafkaNames) and topic in (confluentKafkaTopicNames) timeseries auto facet topic

select appName, name, request.uri, duration, databaseDuration FROM Transaction WHERE clusterName = cluster_name and appName in (appNames) and  name like 'WebTransaction/SpringController%' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' and duration > 2 limit max

FROM K8sContainerSample SELECT latest(memoryUsedBytes) / latest(memoryRequestedBytes) * 100  as 'Memory Used %'  WHERE namespaceName in (namespace_names) and (concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prod') in (appNames) or concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prd') in (appNames)) and clusterName=cluster_name  and `label.app.kubernetes.io/appName` not like 'rsf%' and containerName not like '%istio-proxy%' facet containerName limit max TIMESERIES auto

SELECT average(`availabilityPercent.Average`) AS `Availability`, average(`blobs.availabilityPercent.Average`) AS `Blobs`, average(`files.availabilityPercent.Average`) AS `Files`, average(`tables.availabilityPercent.Average`) AS `Tables`, average(`queues.availabilityPercent.Average`) AS `Queues` FROM AzureStorageAccountSample WHERE ((`provider` = 'AzureStorageAccount') AND (entityGuid in (azureBlobNames))) TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames)
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) FACET appName SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) FACET appName, transactionName,`error.message` SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) FACET appName, transactionName, `error.message` TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) FACET httpResponseCode limit max SINCE 1 day ago

SELECT appName, transactionName,request.uri, httpResponseCode, error.class, error.message,duration,databaseDuration FROM TransactionError where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames)  and httpResponseCode like '5%' limit max

SELECT appName, transactionName,request.uri, httpResponseCode, error.class, error.message,duration,databaseDuration FROM TransactionError where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames)  and httpResponseCode like '4%' limit max

widgets.title: Unhandled Span Errors from External Services

nrqlQueries.query: select appName,parent.app, httpResponseCode, transaction.name,error.class,duration from Span where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName not in  (namespace_names)  and  httpResponseCode in  ('400','404','500',400,404,500,503,'503') and parent.app in (select uniques(appId) from Span where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) LIMIT max) limit max

SELECT percentile(totalTime, 50, 90, 95, 99) FROM Transaction WHERE clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and httpResponseCode = '200' SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 1 hour EXTRAPOLATE

SELECT percentile(totalTime, 50, 90, 99) FROM Transaction WHERE clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and  httpResponseCode = '500' SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 1 hour EXTRAPOLATE

widgets.title: Golden Signals Latency - 50,95,99 Percentile with Username

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(duration, 50, 95, 99) FROM BrowserInteraction where entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) SINCE 1 day ago limit 20 facet customerId, entityId

widgets.title: Golden Signals Latency - HTTP 500 - Trend Analysis

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) WHERE  httpResponseCode = '500' SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 1 hour COMPARE WITH 1 day ago EXTRAPOLATE

widgets.title: Golden Signals Traffic - Throughput Per Minute

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) AS 'Requests per Minute' FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames)  TIMESERIES 10 minute EXTRAPOLATE

widgets.title: Golden Signals Traffic - Throughput Per Hour

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(count(*), 1 hour) AS 'Requests per Hour' FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) since 7 day ago TIMESERIES 1 hour  EXTRAPOLATE

widgets.title: Golden Signals Traffic - Throughput Per Hour

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(count(*), 1 hour) AS 'Requests per Hour' FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 1 hour

widgets.title: Golden Signals Traffic - Throughput Per Hour - Trend Analysis

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(count(*), 1 hour) AS 'Requests per Hour' FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames)  since 7 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago TIMESERIES 1 hour EXTRAPOLATE

widgets.title: Golden Signals Errors - HTTP Status Codes

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '1%') as '1xx Informational', filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '2%') as '2xx Success', filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '3%') as '3xx Redirection', filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '4%') as '4xx Client Error', filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%') as '5xx Server Error' FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) SINCE 1 day ago

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true) AS 'Unhandled Error rate %' FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames)  SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

widgets.title: Golden Signals Errors - HTTP Code Redirection, Client Error And Server Error by Transaction Name

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and httpResponseCode LIKE '3%' or httpResponseCode LIKE '4%' OR httpResponseCode LIKE '5%' SINCE 1 day ago FACET httpResponseCode, name TIMESERIES 10 minutes

widgets.title: Golden Signals Errors - Top 5 Unhandled Application Errors

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames)  FACET appName, error.class SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minute limit 5 EXTRAPOLATE

widgets.title: Golden Signals Errors - Top 10 Unhandled Application Errors with Transaction Name and Host

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError WHERE clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) FACET error.message, transactionName, podName SINCE 1 day ago limit 10

widgets.title: Golden Signals Errors - HTTP Code Redirection, Client Error And Server Error

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '3%' as 'Redirection'), filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '4%' as 'Client Error'), filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%' as 'Server Error') FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minutes EXTRAPOLATE

SELECT percentile(databaseDuration, 50, 90, 99) FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minute EXTRAPOLATE

widgets.title: Golden Signals Saturation - Top 5 Database 90 Percentile by Host and Transaction Name

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(databaseDuration, 90) FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames)  FACET host, name TIMESERIES 1 hour since  1 day ago

widgets.title: Golden Signals Saturation - Database Average Percentile

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(databaseDuration) FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) FACET appName SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 10

rawConfiguration.text:
![Image](https://newrelic.com/content/dam/component-assets/u03-navigation/logo-synthetics.svg)
* Number of checks follow-up
* Availability Analysis
* Performance Analysis
* Third Party Analysis
* [Dive deeper into Synthetic Monitoring](https://synthetics.newrelic.com/accounts/2119955/monitors)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM SyntheticCheck where entityGuid = AvailabilitySynthetics SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH  1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM SyntheticCheck where entityGuid = AvailabilitySynthetics FACET result

widgets.title: Request & Response Total Size (KB) over time

nrqlQueries.query: from SyntheticCheck select average(totalRequestHeaderSize+totalRequestBodySize)/1000 as 'Request Size (KB)', average(totalResponseBodySize)/1000 as 'Response Size (KB)' where entityGuid = AvailabilitySynthetics

widgets.title: Request & Response Total Size (KB) over time

nrqlQueries.query: from SyntheticCheck select average(totalRequestHeaderSize+totalRequestBodySize)/1000 as 'Request Size (KB)', average(totalResponseBodySize)/1000 as 'Response Size (KB)' where entityGuid = AvailabilitySynthetics  TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM SyntheticCheck where entityGuid = AvailabilitySynthetics FACET monitorName
SELECT percentage(count(result), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') as 'Availability Rate' FROM SyntheticCheck where entityGuid = AvailabilitySynthetics SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT percentage(count(result), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') as 'Availability' FROM SyntheticCheck where entityGuid = AvailabilitySynthetics SINCE 1 day ago FACET locationLabel TIMESERIES
SELECT percentage(count(result), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') as 'Availability' FROM SyntheticCheck where entityGuid = AvailabilitySynthetics SINCE 1 day ago FACET locationLabel
SELECT count(contentCategory) FROM SyntheticRequest where entityGuid = AvailabilitySynthetics FACET contentCategory  TIMESERIES
SELECT count(contentCategory) FROM SyntheticRequest where entityGuid = AvailabilitySynthetics FACET contentCategory
SELECT count(verb) as 'HTTP Requests' FROM SyntheticRequest where entityGuid = AvailabilitySynthetics FACET verb

SELECT average(duration) as 'Avg Duration', percentile(duration,50) as 'Median', percentile(duration,90) as '90th Percentile', count(hierarchicalURL) as 'Count'  FROM SyntheticRequest where entityGuid = AvailabilitySynthetics FACET hierarchicalURL, domain, verb,contentCategory, contentType  limit 20

rawConfiguration.text:
![Image](https://newrelic.com/content/dam/component-assets/u03-navigation/logo-apm.svg)
* Use below charts to filter this dashboard by App, by Transaction, by Response Code and/or by Host, or below links to dive deeper in the New Relic portal
* [Web Portal App Overview](https://rpm.newrelic.com/accounts/1606862/applications/)
* [Web Portal App Deployments](https://rpm.newrelic.com/accounts/1606862/applications/43192210/deployments)
* [Service Maps](https://rpm.newrelic.com/accounts/1606862/service_maps)
* [Key Transactions](https://rpm.newrelic.com/accounts/1606862/key_transactions)
* [Distributed Tracing](https://rpm.newrelic.com/accounts/2040817/applications/156206528/tracing?duration=1800000&facetType=TRACE_HAS_ERRORS&query=&sortBy=2&sortDir=DESC)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) from Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' since 1 hour ago compare WITH 1 day ago

SELECT count(*) from Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' since 1 day ago compare WITH 1 day ago TIMESERIES

SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' FACET appName since 1 hour ago

SELECT average(duration) from Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' since 1 hour ago compare WITH 1 day ago

SELECT average(duration) FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' FACET appName  TIMESERIES

SELECT percentile(duration, 50, 90, 95, 99) from Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle'  facet appName, name

SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' FACET httpResponseCode SINCE 1 hour ago

SELECT count(*) from Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' facet name TIMESERIES

SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' SINCE 1 day ago facet host

SELECT histogram(duration) from Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' facet name

SELECT count(*) from Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' facet name

SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' SINCE 1 day ago facet host TIMESERIES

SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and httpResponseCode LIKE '5%' and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' facet host SINCE 1 day ago

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%') FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' SINCE 1 day ago

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%') FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' facet appName,`error.message` since 1 hour ago

SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' FACET name WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%' SINCE 1 day ago

SELECT appName, host, transactionSubtype, transactionType, name FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' and httpResponseCode LIKE '5%' SINCE 1 day ago

SELECT histogram(databaseDuration) FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' FACET buckets(databaseDuration, width: 10, buckets: 10) SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 20

SELECT histogram(databaseDuration) FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' FACET appName  SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 10

SELECT histogram(databaseDuration) FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' FACET name SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 10

widgets.title: Pearson correlation - transaction duration/db call count

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT (count(*) * sum(duration * databaseCallCount) - sum(duration) * sum(databaseCallCount)) / (sqrt(count(*) * sum(pow(duration,2)) - pow(sum(duration),2)) * (sqrt(count(*) * sum(pow(databaseCallCount,2)) - pow(sum(databaseCallCount),2)))) as 'pearson correlation' from Transaction where  clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and databaseCallCount is NOT NULL and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' facet appName since 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

SELECT sum(databaseDuration) as 'Time', count(*) as 'Count', percentile(databaseDuration, 99, 80, 50) as 'DB', max(databaseDuration) FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and name != 'WebTransaction/Servlet/dispatcherServlet' and name not like 'WebTransaction/SpringController/OperationHandler/handle' FACET name SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 15

FROM K8sContainerSample SELECT average(cpuUsedCores / cpuLimitCores) * 100 as 'CPU Cores Used' WHERE namespaceName in (namespace_names) and (concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prod') in (appNames) or concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prd') in (appNames)) and clusterName=cluster_name   SINCE 1 day ago

FROM K8sContainerSample SELECT average(memoryUtilization) as 'Overall Memory Used %' WHERE namespaceName in (namespace_names) and (concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prod') in (appNames) or concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prd') in (appNames)) and clusterName=cluster_name   SINCE 1 day ago

FROM K8sContainerSample SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes) as 'Actual Memory Used Bytes' WHERE namespaceName in (namespace_names) and (concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prod') in (appNames) or concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prd') in (appNames)) and clusterName=cluster_name   SINCE 1 day ago

FROM K8sContainerSample SELECT average(cpuUsedCores / cpuLimitCores) * 100 as 'CPU Cores Used' WHERE namespaceName in (namespace_names) and (concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prod') in (appNames) or concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prd') in (appNames)) and clusterName=cluster_name   facet `label.app.kubernetes.io/appName` SINCE 1 day ago

FROM K8sContainerSample SELECT average(memoryUtilization) as 'Overall Memory Used %' WHERE namespaceName in (namespace_names) and (concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prod') in (appNames) or concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prd') in (appNames)) and clusterName=cluster_name   facet `label.app.kubernetes.io/appName` SINCE 1 day ago

widgets.title: Actual Memory Used Bytes by Service

nrqlQueries.query: FROM K8sContainerSample SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes) as 'Actual Memory Used Bytes' WHERE namespaceName in (namespace_names) and (concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prod') in (appNames) or concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prd') in (appNames)) and clusterName=cluster_name   FACET `label.app.kubernetes.io/appName` SINCE 1 day ago

FROM K8sContainerSample SELECT average(cpuUsedCores / cpuLimitCores) * 100 as 'CPU Cores Used' WHERE namespaceName in (namespace_names) and (concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prod') in (appNames) or concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prd') in (appNames)) and clusterName=cluster_name   facet `label.app.kubernetes.io/appName` TIMESERIES  SINCE 1 day ago

FROM K8sContainerSample SELECT average(memoryUtilization) as 'Overall Memory Used %' WHERE namespaceName in (namespace_names) and (concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prod') in (appNames) or concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prd') in (appNames)) and clusterName=cluster_name   facet `label.app.kubernetes.io/appName` TIMESERIES  SINCE 1 day ago

widgets.title: Actual Memory Used Bytes By Service

nrqlQueries.query: FROM K8sContainerSample SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes) as 'Actual Memory Used Bytes' WHERE namespaceName in (namespace_names) and (concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prod') in (appNames) or concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prd') in (appNames)) and clusterName=cluster_name   FACET `label.app.kubernetes.io/appName` TIMESERIES  SINCE 1 day ago

SELECT (average(apm.service.memory.heap.used) / average(apm.service.memory.heap.max)) * 100 AS 'Heap Usage Percentage' from Metric WHERE  appName in (appNames)  FACET `host`, `host.displayName` OR `instanceName` TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT average(apm.service.java.memory.pool) * 1000 * 1000 FROM Metric WHERE  (heapType NOT LIKE 'Heap') AND  appName in (appNames) FACET `host`, `host.displayName` OR `instanceName`, `name`, `heapType`, `usageType` LIMIT MAX  TIMESERIES

SELECT filter(average(newrelic.timeslice.value), where metricTimesliceName = 'JmxBuiltIn/Threads/Thread Count') as 'ThreadCount' FROM Metric WHERE   appName in (appNames) FACET `host`, `host.displayName` OR `instanceName` LIMIT MAX SINCE 86400 seconds AGO TIMESERIES
SELECT average(dtuConsumptionPercent.Total) AS 'DTU Used %' FROM AzureSqlDatabaseSample where name in (azureDBNames) FACET name TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(cpuPercent.Total) as 'CPU %' FROM AzureSqlDatabaseSample where name in (azureDBNames) FACET name TIMESERIES auto

SELECT average(storagePercent.Total) as 'Storage %' 
FROM AzureSqlDatabaseSample 
where name in (azureDBNames) FACET name
TIMESERIES auto

SELECT latest(connectionFailed.Total) as 'Failed Connections' 
FROM AzureSqlDatabaseSample 
WHERE  name in (azureDBNames) FACET name
TIMESERIES 1 minute

SELECT latest(connectionSuccessful.Total) as 'Successful Connections' 
FROM AzureSqlDatabaseSample 
where name in (azureDBNames) FACET name
TIMESERIES auto

SELECT average(`availabilityPercent.Average`) AS `Availability`, average(`blobs.availabilityPercent.Average`) AS `Blobs`, average(`files.availabilityPercent.Average`) AS `Files`, average(`tables.availabilityPercent.Average`) AS `Tables`, average(`queues.availabilityPercent.Average`) AS `Queues` FROM AzureStorageAccountSample WHERE ((`provider` = 'AzureStorageAccount') AND (entityGuid in (azureBlobNames))) TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT latest(cpuUsagePercent.Maximum) from AzureServiceBusNamespaceSample WHERe name in (azureServiceBusNames) facet name TIMESERIES auto
SELECT latest(memoryUsagePercent.Maximum) from AzureServiceBusNamespaceSample WHERe name in (azureServiceBusNames) TIMESERIES auto

SELECT latest(deadletteredMessages.Average) as 'DEAD LETTER MESSAGES BY TOPIC' from AzureServiceBusTopicSample where namespace in (azureServiceBusNames) and name in (azureServiceBusTopicNames) and deadletteredMessages.Average > 0 LIMIT max facet name
SELECT latest(serverErrors.Total) from AzureServiceBusNamespaceSample WHERe name in (azureServiceBusNames) TIMESERIES auto
SELECT latest(userErrors.Maximum) from AzureServiceBusNamespaceSample WHERe name in (azureServiceBusNames) TIMESERIES auto

SELECT count(*) AS 'Service Bus Events'
FROM Transaction 
WHERE  namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames) and clusterName = cluster_name facet appName, name
SELECT latest(activeMessages.Average) from AzureServiceBusTopicSample WHERe namespace in (azureServiceBusNames) and name in (azureServiceBusTopicNames) facet name TIMESERIES auto
FROM Metric SELECT average(numeric(getField(azure.cache.redis.usedmemorypercentage, max))) where azure.resourceName in (azureRedisCacheNames) TIMESERIES auto facet azure.resourceName

FROM Metric SELECT average(numeric(getField(azure.cache.redis.allcacheWrite, max))) as 'Write', average(numeric(getField(azure.cache.redis.allcacheRead, max))) as 'Read' where azure.resourceName in (azureRedisCacheNames) TIMESERIES auto facet azure.resourceName
FROM Metric SELECT average(numeric(getField(azure.cache.redis.errors, count))) where azure.resourceName in (azureRedisCacheNames) TIMESERIES auto facet azure.resourceName
FROM Metric SELECT average(numeric(getField(azure.cache.redis.connectedclients, max))) where azure.resourceName in (azureRedisCacheNames) TIMESERIES auto facet azure.resourceName
FROM Metric SELECT average(numeric(getField(azure.cache.redis.totalkeys0, max))) where azure.resourceName in (azureRedisCacheNames) TIMESERIES auto facet azure.resourceName
SELECT latest(confluent_kafka_server_consumer_lag_offsets) FROM Metric where kafka_id in (confluentKafkaNames) and topic in (confluentKafkaTopicNames) timeseries auto facet topic

widgets.title: Confluent Kafka Consumer Lags (By Consumer Group)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(confluent_kafka_server_consumer_lag_offsets) FROM Metric where kafka_id in (confluentKafkaNames) and topic in (confluentKafkaTopicNames) timeseries auto facet topic, consumer_group_id
SELECT uniqueCount(session) AS 'Visitors' FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago  facet entityGuid
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') FROM SyntheticCheck  where entityGuid = AvailabilitySynthetics  SINCE 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT 100 - percentage(count(*), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') as 'Downtime' FROM SyntheticCheck  where entityGuid = AvailabilitySynthetics  SINCE 1 month ago facet location limit 5
SELECT uniqueCount(session) AS 'Users' FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) TIMESERIES 1 minute  facet entityGuid
SELECT uniqueCount(customerId) as 'Customers' FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) limit max facet dateOf(timestamp),entityGuid since 7 days ago

SELECT uniqueCount(customerId) FROM AjaxRequest where string(httpResponseCode) NOT LIKE '2%' and httpResponseCode is NOT NULL and httpResponseCode != 0 and entityGuid in (BrowserGuids)  facet entityGuid

SELECT uniqueCount(customerId) FROM AjaxRequest where string(httpResponseCode) NOT LIKE '2%' and httpResponseCode is NOT NULL and httpResponseCode != 0 and entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) facet substring(pageUrl,30,200),httpResponseCode, customerId,entityGuid limit max
SELECT histogram(duration*2,10) as Duration FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids)  facet entityGuid

rawConfiguration.text:
![Image](https://newrelic.com/content/dam/component-assets/u03-navigation/logo-browser.svg)
* Use below charts to filter by Domain, Category, Device, Country or Browser
* Use calendar options on the right to filter
* Narrow results up to 1 URL from the URL Heatmap
* Compare funnels between slow & fast pages
* Compare Front-End vs Back-End Performance
* [Dive deeper into Real User Monitoring](https://rpm.newrelic.com/accounts/1606862/browser)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM PageView WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids)  facet domain,entityGuid   TIMESERIES auto
SELECT histogram(duration, width: 10) FROM PageView WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids)  facet entityGuid  since 1 week ago
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) facet domain, entityGuid
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) FACET deviceType, entityGuid TIMESERIES  SINCE 1 DAY AGO
SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids)  facet domain,entityGuid  timeseries
select count(*) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) FACET deviceType, entityGuid  SINCE 1 DAY AGO
SELECT count(domain) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) FACET countryCode, entityGuid  TIMESERIES  SINCE 1 DAY AGO
SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) FACET deviceType, entityGuid TIMESERIES SINCE 1 DAY AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) facet countryCode, entityGuid
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids)  FACET userAgentName, entityGuid  TIMESERIES  SINCE 1 DAY AGO
SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) FACET countryCode, entityGuid  SINCE 1 DAY AGO limit max
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) facet userAgentName, entityGuid
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) since 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago facet entityGuid
SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) FACET userAgentName, entityGuid   SINCE 1 DAY AGO
SELECT UniqueCount(session) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids)  since 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago facet entityGuid
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) TIMESERIES since 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago facet entityGuid
SELECT average(duration) as 'seconds' FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids)  since 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago facet entityGuid
SELECT UniqueCount(session) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) TIMESERIES since 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago facet entityGuid
SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) TIMESERIES since 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago facet entityGuid
SELECT histogram(duration, width:10) from PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids)  facet pageUrl, entityGuid
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) facet pageUrl, entityGuid

widgets.title: Average Page Load Time (Front-end vs Backend)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(duration) as 'Avg Page Load Time (sec)', average(backendDuration) as 'Avg Backend Time (sec)', average(networkDuration) as 'Avg Network (sec)' FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) SINCE 1 day ago facet entityGuid

SELECT average(networkDuration) as 'Network (sec)', average(backendDuration) as 'Backend Time (sec)',average(duration) as 'Page Load time (sec)' FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES facet entityGuid

SELECT average(timeToFetchStart) AS 'Request queueing', average(timeToResponseStart) AS 'First byte', average(firstPaint) as 'First paint', average(firstContentfulPaint) as 'First contentful paint', average(timeToDomInteractive) as 'Time to Interactive', average(timeToDomContentLoadedEventEnd) AS 'DOM content loaded', average(timeToLoadEventEnd) AS 'Window load', average(duration) AS 'Window load + AJAX' FROM BrowserInteraction  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) WHERE category = 'Initial page load' AND `mobileOptimized` IS NULL facet entityGuid

SELECT average(timeToFetchStart) AS 'Request queueing', average(timeToResponseStart) AS 'First byte', average(firstPaint) as 'First paint', average(firstContentfulPaint) as 'First contentful paint', average(timeToDomInteractive) as 'Time to Interactive', average(timeToDomContentLoadedEventEnd) AS 'DOM content loaded', average(timeToLoadEventEnd) AS 'Window load', average(duration) AS 'Window load + AJAX' FROM BrowserInteraction  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) WHERE category = 'Initial page load' TIMESERIES auto facet entityGuid

SELECT percentile(duration,10) AS '10th PLT', percentile(duration,50) AS 'Median PLT', percentile(duration,90) AS '90th PLT', percentile(duration,95) AS '95th PLT' FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) facet entityGuid
SELECT histogram(firstPaint,width:4) as 'First paint' FROM BrowserInteraction  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids)  WHERE category = 'Initial page load' facet entityGuid
SELECT percentile(firstPaint,50) as 'First paint'   FROM BrowserInteraction  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) WHERE category = 'Initial page load' facet targetUrl, entityGuid
SELECT percentile(duration, 10, 50, 90, 95), average(duration) FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids)  TIMESERIES facet entityGuid
SELECT apdex(duration,t: 2) AS '' FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) SINCE 1 day ago facet entityGuid
SELECT apdex(duration,t: 0.5) AS '' FROM Transaction  WHERE clusterName=cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names)  SINCE 1 day ago

widgets.title: Longest Time to Interactive (Median) by URL

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(timeToDomInteractive  ,50) as 'Time to Interactive'   FROM BrowserInteraction  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids)  WHERE category = 'Initial page load' facet targetUrl, entityGuid
SELECT apdex(duration,t: 2) AS '' FROM PageView  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids)  SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES facet entityGuid
SELECT apdex(duration,t: 0.5) AS '' FROM Transaction where clusterName = cluster_name and namespaceName in (namespace_names) and appName in (appNames)  SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) FACET userAgentName, entityGuid SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) FACET errorClass, entityGuid SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES facet entityGuid
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) facet errorMessage,entityGuid
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) FACET requestUri, entityGuid SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) SINCE 1 hour ago FACET transactionName, entityGuid
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) FACET userAgentVersion, entityGuid SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError  WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) FACET stackTrace, entityGuid SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) AS 'sessions' FROM Mobile where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid  SINCE 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(uuid) as 'Unique User Logins' FROM Mobile where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid SINCE 1 week ago
SELECT count(responseTime) from MobileRequest where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid facet appVersion TIMESERIES since  1 week ago
SELECT Count(*)  FROM MobileRequest where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid SINCE 1 day ago facet deviceModel

widgets.title: Slowest HTTP Requests by Device Model

nrqlQueries.query: from MobileRequest select average(responseTime) where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid facet deviceModel
select count(*) FROM Mobile where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid SINCE 1 day ago  facet deviceManufacturer
SELECT average(duration) FROM Transaction SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago TIMESERIES AUTO
select count(*) from Mobile where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid  facet carrier
SELECT uniqueCount(session) AS 'Site Visitors' FROM PageView where  entityGuid = 'BrowserEntityGuid' SINCE 1 minute ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago TIMESERIES
SELECT average(responseTime)  FROM MobileRequest where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid  SINCE 1 day ago facet deviceModel

widgets.title: Time Spent in App by App Version

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(sessionDuration) FROM Mobile where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid SINCE 1 week ago facet appVersion
SELECT average(responseTime) from MobileRequest where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid facet deviceManufacturer
SELECT average(responseTime) FROM MobileRequest where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid SINCE 1 day ago facet deviceModel TIMESERIES
select count(*) from Mobile where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid  facet carrier
SELECT average(responseTime) from MobileRequest where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid facet deviceManufacturer TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) from MobileCrash where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid  SINCE 1 day ago facet deviceModel
select count(*) from Mobile where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid  facet carrier
SELECT count(*) from MobileCrash where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid facet deviceManufacturer
SELECT average(sessionDuration) FROM MobileRequest where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid SINCE 1 day ago facet deviceModel
SELECT count(*) from MobileCrash where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid  facet carrier
SELECT count(responseTime) from MobileRequest where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid facet appVersion
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileCrash where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid FACET `appVersion`

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM MobileCrash where entityGuid = MobileAndroidGuid  WHERE crashFingerprint NOT IN(  ) FACET `appVersion`  TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) AS 'sessions' FROM Mobile where entityGuid = MobileIOSGuid  SINCE 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(uuid) as 'Unique User Logins' FROM Mobile where entityGuid = MobileIOSGuid SINCE 1 week ago
SELECT count(responseTime) from MobileRequest where entityGuid = MobileIOSGuid facet appVersion TIMESERIES since  1 week ago
SELECT Count(*)  FROM MobileRequest where entityGuid = MobileIOSGuid SINCE 1 day ago facet deviceModel

nrqlQueries.query: from MobileRequest select average(responseTime) where entityGuid = MobileIOSGuid facet deviceModel

select count(*) from Mobile where entityGuid = MobileIOSGuid  facet carrier

SELECT average(responseTime)  FROM MobileRequest where entityGuid = MobileIOSGuid  SINCE 1 day ago facet deviceModel
